entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 7 except 11 inland.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. High 7 except 11 inland. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain mixed with snow beginning in the morning. Periods of snow over higher terrain. Rainfall amount 5 mm except snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 in the Wreckhouse area in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Monday 02 May 2016
